structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
Adoption Of Children And Change Of Names

law.catch_line: Failure To Object After Notice; Proceedings
law.text: If, after such notice, a person whose consent is required does not appear and object to the adoption, the court may act upon the petition without his consent, subject to his right of appeal, or it may appoint a guardian ad litem with power to give or withhold consent.
